title: Thai Food Adventure Guide
description: Your culinary bucket list with locations and prices!

foods.name: 🍜 Pad Thai
foods.note: Best: Ghost Gate Pad Thai

foods.name: 🥗 Som Tum (Papaya Salad)
foods.note: Spice level: Start mild!

foods.name: 🥭 Mango Sticky Rice
foods.note: Peak season: April-May

foods.name: 🍛 Tom Yum Goong
foods.note: Classic spicy shrimp soup

foods.name: 🥘 Massaman Curry
foods.note: Rich and slightly sweet

foods.name: 🍳 Pad Krapow
foods.note: Thai basil stir-fry with egg

foods.name: 🍢 Grilled Fish
foods.note: Whole fish with herbs

foods.name: 🍜 Boat Noodles
foods.note: Tiny bowls, big flavors

foods.name: 🍲 Khao Soi (Chiang Mai Noodles)
foods.note: Northern curry noodle soup with crispy noodles

foods.name: 🍗 Gai Yang (Grilled Chicken)
foods.note: Marinated and charcoal-grilled; best with sticky rice

foods.name: 🥩 Larb (Minced Meat Salad)
foods.note: Zesty Isan minced meat salad (spicy!)

foods.name: 🍢 Satay Skewers
foods.note: Grilled skewers (usually pork or chicken) with peanut sauce

foods.name: 🍡 Sai Krok Isan (Isan Sausage)
foods.note: Garlicky fermented pork sausage, often served with ginger

foods.name: 🍜 Yen Ta Fo (Pink Noodle Soup)
foods.note: Bright pink broth from fermented tofu with fish balls

foods.name: 🍚 Khao Man Gai (Chicken Rice)
foods.note: Hainanese-style poached chicken and rice with spicy sauce

foods.name: 🦀 Crab Omelette
foods.note: Legendary crab-stuffed omelette (Michelin-starred)

foods.name: 🦪 Oyster Omelette (Hoy Tod)
foods.note: Crispy fried egg omelette loaded with fresh oysters

foods.name: 🍝 Pad See Ew
foods.note: Soy sauce stir-fried flat noodles with chicken & broccoli

foods.name: 🌶️ Pad Kee Mao (Drunken Noodles)
foods.note: Spicy flat noodles with holy basil and chili

foods.name: 🍛 Green Curry (Gaeng Keow Wan)
foods.note: Sweet-spicy green curry with coconut milk and basil

foods.name: 🥘 Panang Curry
foods.note: Thick, creamy curry with peanuts and kaffir lime

foods.name: 🍢 Sai Ua (Chiang Mai Sausage)
foods.note: Spiced herbal pork sausage from the North

foods.name: 🍤 Hokkien Mee
foods.note: Phuket's famous thick egg noodles stir-fried with seafood

foods.name: 🍨 Coconut Ice Cream
foods.note: Served in a coconut shell with assorted toppings

foods.name: 🥞 Banana Roti
foods.note: Pan-fried crepe filled with banana & drizzled with condensed milk

foods.name: 🍈 Durian (King of Fruits)
foods.note: Notorious spiky fruit – try if you dare!

foods.name: 🍖 Khao Kha Moo (Pork Leg Rice)
foods.note: Tender braised pork leg on rice with pickled mustard greens
